projects.mainTitle: Norwood Water Commission – 100,000 Gallon Finished Water Storage Tank
mainContent: A new 100,000-gallon finished water storage tank was designed and constructed to take an existing 500,000-gallon tank off-line for maintenance, repairs, and a new paint system.
The new tank includes separate inlet and outlet pipe connections and hanging baffle curtains to minimize short-circuiting and retention time.

pageContext.project: Norwood Water Commission – 100,000 Gallon Finished Water Storage Tank
